comment: Mr. Khoury is genuinely good person and great professor. He genuinely cares about being there for his students and answers questions clearly no matter how stupid it is. His students were his priority. I once turned in 3 assignments at 3:51am and each were graded by 6am. what does that tell you?

Prof. Khoury is nice guy. At first, he looks like mean but overall he is good but there are many work for this class. His class consist of research paper 5-7 pages APA style, community service project, strategy project, quiz every chapter (once a week basically), midterm and final. He didn't give any study guide for test.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS
